title: Jewelry Website
description: This is a website for a jewelry store. It is a single page application that allows the user to add, edit, and delete jewelry. It is built with React and Redux. The user can also search for jewelry by name, price, or type.

title: Watch Website
description: This is a website for a watch store. It is a single page application that allows the user to add, edit, and delete watches. It is built with React and Redux. The user can also search for watches by name, price, or type.

title: Chat Website
description: Website allows you and your friend create rooms and invite people to join room, using Firebase, React to build

title: Facebook Clone
description: Website allows you post new feed, add friends and chat with your friends without show messages to others, using Firebase, Reactjs to build

title: Food Order Website
description: User can order food in website, and manage their payment online, can create, update and delete restaurant, food in your restaurant as seller
